data.event: El Dorado was laid out and platted in 1868.

event.title: 1877, the Florence, El Dorado, and Walnut Valley Railroad Company built

data.event: In 1877, the Florence, El Dorado, and Walnut Valley Railroad Company built a branch line from Florence to El Dorado; in 1881 it was extended to Douglass, and later to Arkansas City.
In 1877, the Florence, El Dorado, and Walnut Valley Railroad Company built a branch line from Florence to El Dorado; in 1881 it was extended to Douglass, and later to Arkansas City.
The line from Florence to El Dorado was abandoned in 1942.

event.title: 1915, the El Dorado Oil Field was the first oil field that was found

data.event: In 1915, the El Dorado Oil Field was the first oil field that was found using science/geologic mapping, and part of the Mid-Continent oil province.
